thread.title: Details set for Republican party's November debate
thread.title_full: Details set for Republican party's November debate - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Details set for Republican party's November debate
text:
By STEVE PEOPLES
Associated Press WASHINGTON (AP) - The Republican party's 2016 presidential contenders will meet on the debate stage next month in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
That's according to the debate host, Fox Business Network, which on Monday announced the date and location of the GOP's Nov. 10 debate. The primetime affair will be held in the city's Milwaukee Theater.
The Wisconsin faceoff is the fourth presidential debate sanctioned by the Republican National Committee. The host network has yet to announce the participation criteria. Previous criteria depended upon national polls.
Republicans have four more debates scheduled before the Iowa caucuses in February. That includes a meeting later this month in Colorado.
___
This story corrects the name of Fox Business Network, referred to in a previous story as Fox Business News.
